verses.name: Psalms 139:17
verses.text: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them!

verses.name: Psalms 139:18
verses.text: If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.

verses.name: Psalms 139:19
verses.text: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.

verses.name: Psalms 139:20
verses.text: For they speak against thee wickedly, and thine enemies take thy name in vain.

verses.name: Psalms 139:21
verses.text: Do not I hate them, O Lord, that hate thee? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?

verses.name: Psalms 139:22
verses.text: I hate them with perfect hatred: I count them mine enemies.
